mod.name: Criminal System
mod.author: Kimoszin
mod.action:
domodlib("criminal_config")
if (item.itemid == 7735) then return criminal:doSteal(cid, itemEx.uid) end
if (item.itemid == 7409) then return criminal:doArrest(cid, itemEx.uid) end

domodlib("criminal_config")
if not(criminal:getJailTime(cid) <= 0) then return criminal:doWarning(cid, criminal.message.jailTimeLeft:format(criminal:getJailTime(cid))) end
if (criminal:isOnJail(cid)) then return criminal:doSetStatus(cid, CONST_CIVIL) and doTeleportThing(cid, toPosition) and setPlayerStorageValue(cid, criminal.config.storageOnJail, -1) and true else return criminal:doWarning(cid, criminal.message.notJail) end
